00031         // just to be able to set the capcity of the container
00032         
00033         template<class _Ty, class _Container = vector<_Ty>, class _Pr = less<typename _Container::value_type> >
00034         class reservable_priority_queue: public std::priority_queue<_Ty, _Container, _Pr> 
00035         {
00036         public:
00037                                                                                                         reservable_priority_queue(size_type capacity = 0) { reserve(capacity); };
00038                 void                                                                            reserve(size_type capacity) { this->c.reserve(capacity); } 
00039                 size_type                                                                       capacity() const { return this->c.capacity(); } 
00040         };
00041         
00043     class GraphEdgePQ
00044     {
00045                 public:
00049                                                                                                         GraphEdgePQ(long name, double priority)
00050                                                                                                         {
00051                                                                                                                 m_name = name;
00052                                                                                                                 m_priority = priority;
00053                                                                                                         }
00055                                                                                                         ~GraphEdgePQ(void){}
00056                 private:
00057                         long                                                                    m_name;                                         
00058                         double                                                                  m_priority;                                     
00059 
00060         friend bool                                 operator<(const GraphEdgePQ & lhs, const GraphEdgePQ & rhs);
00062         friend bool                                 operator>(const GraphEdgePQ & lhs, const GraphEdgePQ & rhs);
00063                 friend class HACD;
00064     };
00065     inline bool                                                                         operator<(const GraphEdgePQ & lhs, const GraphEdgePQ & rhs)
00066                                                                                                         {
00067                                                                                                                 if (lhs.m_priority!=rhs.m_priority) return lhs.m_priority<rhs.m_priority;
00068                                                                                                                 return lhs.m_name < rhs.m_name;
00069                                                                                                         }
00070     inline bool                                                                         operator>(const GraphEdgePQ & lhs, const GraphEdgePQ & rhs)
00071                                                                                                         {
00072                                                                                                                 if (lhs.m_priority!=rhs.m_priority) return lhs.m_priority>rhs.m_priority;
00073                                                                                                                 return lhs.m_name > rhs.m_name;
00074                                                                                                         }
00075     typedef void (*CallBackFunction)(const char *, double, double, size_t);

00209                 static unsigned long long                                       GetEdgeIndex(unsigned long long a, unsigned long long b) 
00210                                                                                                         { 
00211                                                                                                                 if (a > b) return (a << 32) + b;
00212                                                                                                                 else       return (b << 32) + a;
00213                                                                                                         }
